name: DOCS_RCVD_ASMT
description: Table to maintain information related to assessments and risk scores. The information stored in this table was received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ASMT_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference identifier associated with the assessment.

columns.name: ASMT_SRC_DXR
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number (CSN) of the received document record from which the assessment for this row was sourced.

columns.name: ASMT_DATETIME
columns.description: The clinically relevant date for this assessment. This could be the recorded date or the date of an update for a current assessment.

columns.name: ASMT_LAST_UPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last update instant of this assessment in UTC.

columns.name: ASMT_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the assessment name sent by the external source.

columns.name: ASMT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The ASMT_STATUS_C column contains the status of a received assessment. Under normal circumstances, only cancelled or removed statuses will be filled out.
